Sorry Zuni, but eggplant is finished! Here's my recipe for it though - just 'cos I'm bored and I'm a show-off :P Sour Eggplant/ Khattay Baingan 8 baby eggplants, cut into quarters 1 small onion, finely diced 2 spring onions, finally sliced 1/2 small green pepper (shimla mirch), finely diced 1/2 cup pureed tomatoes (or fry 3/4 cup crushed fresh tomatoes in a little oil into a paste and reduce it) 1 tsp crushed garlic (or 1 clove minced) 1/2 tsp black onion seeds (kalonji) 1 tsp cumin seeds (zeera) 1/2 tsp tumeric (haldi) 1 tsp red chilli powder (or to taste) Salt (to taste) 4-6 tbsp Oil green chillis, chopped small bunch coriander leaves (dhania), chopped Fry the onion, spring onion, kalonji and zeera in medium-hot oil until pink and translucent. Add the pepper and garlic, fry for a minute and add the eggplant. Stir to mix and add the spices and seasoning. Fry for a few minutes and then add the tomatoes and bring to a boil (or until it bubbles, which will be soon!). Reduce heat to minimum, cover and cook. Garnish with chopped green chillis and coriander. Serve hot or cold... Yum!
And who is that person? I just had a nice lunch. Mmm... Mmm.. Good. Ahhhh!
"Someone". Anyway...I just had boiled rice with khattay baingain (sour egglpant in a tomato sauce)... YUM!

So i can get it registered :))

Ummm... Hello? Anyone there? My name is Ken. I'm from Kenmore. Hello? Oh, Hi There. How are you? I am perfectly fine. You are to? Good Good. That is great. One must feel good about themselves. Yes, yes, I saw. ColdSkin has a nice take on the defination of "Life". I say, life is like a box of chocolates. Umm, what? Oh you are right. I didn't say that. Forrest did. Now that was a movie. I agree. You do have a point there. Well anyways, it was great chatting with you. The pleasure was mine. Goodbye. :)

Life n. pl. lives (lvz) The property or quality that distinguishes living organisms from dead organisms and inanimate matter, manifested in functions such as metabolism, growth, reproduction, and response to stimuli or adaptation to the environment originating from within the organism. Man, these guys can define anything but I think it's a crime to define it in such cold manner! If I had my say nowadays then this is how I shell define it: Life A finite journey through a wobbly thin rope. The trick is in the balance with little room for error. One wrong step and we all fall down! death ( P ) Pronunciation Key (dth) n. The act of dying; termination of life. The state of being dead. The cause of dying: Drugs were the death of him. A manner of dying: a heroine's death. often Death A personification of the destroyer of life, usually represented as a skeleton holding a scythe. Bloodshed; murder. Execution. Law. Civil death. The termination or extinction of something: the death of imperialism. bla bla bla....I know death is dark but it can be defined! Death The Fall; The wrong step taken on the wobbly rope of life; Loss of Balance

Bitch. Bitch. Bitch. Bitch. House hunting is a bitch. Locking horns with your father who wants to live 55 kms away from downtown is a bitch. Having your life, languages, loves and *men* centred in downtown (thus) is a bitch. Hmm. Mebbe not. Arzee's in Mississauga ;) Being unemployed is a bitch. Being physically exhausted and mentally drained is a bitch. Typing when your fingers are fibrillating from exhaustion is a bitch. Sleeping at 2am knowing you've got to be up in less than 8 hrs is a bitch. Life's a bitch. You never know which orifice you're going to be fucked in next. That's all for tonight folks. Peace out.

Gmail might seem awesome at first but I will not use it as my primary email address if I were you. There is a current controversy going on because google plan to scan your emails and then according to that you will have the appropriate ads on the sides of the browser. For example matching words in your email related to electronic, male enhancement: p, etc. Good for using it as an online briefcase though.
The word "Refund" doesn't exists in their vocabulary!

I just friggin tried sending an email to a Naseeber and this is what it coughed back at me: "! For your own protection, you may not post your personal email address, lastname, or instant messenger id on Naseeb. Doing so can damage your trusted circle by allowing people you don't really know to contact your friends and their friends. Violation of this policy will result in the termination of your account." The only thing friggin close to an email address in my message was the use of the word 'MSN messenger'!! Argh! What the FUCK is up with Naseeb? I've already posted my email address and last name to 3 people through the Naseeb mailbox earlier. Will Naseeb pay me a refund for allowing that? Hmph!

You won't believe the gunk under my laptop's keys. Hair, chips, food splotches, dust, dust mites (so what if I can't see them? They exist!), more dust, even more dust, trails of dust like lint, a bit of a nail (the finger kind).. Ew. I am so grossed out by my own laptop. Now I know what three years of grime looks like. It was a used laptop so I wonder if the guy who owned it ever cleaned it in the two years he had had it. Makes you think.... My MANY thanks to my baasht fraand MT who not only patiently cleaned the gunk under my laptop but also backed up all my data and is now reformatting my system and fixing it all up, as good as new! So whilst I type this in his tres coowal office in west end Toronto, I sigh at his 19 inch flat screen monitor and go "If only.....".

And I just realised what else was making my eye twitch at reading the heading of this blogspot. It's the word "adobe". Damnit Zee, the word is "abode"! (which means home).. unless you wanted to take the piss out of Adobe (acrobat reader? photoshop?) people...which I don't think you wanted to do. Aagh. Change the typo! Back to the drawing board for me.

I'm pissed off. Left this comment on my own article covering Monis. "I've been a big fan and supporter of Naseeb since its inception last year. I have supported the work of the Naseeb team, the fact that it needs to charge (how else will it run as a business?) and given as much feedback as possible to make sure that the users voices are being heard. With all due respect, my love for Naseeb aside, I have a huge complaint. And that is that I can't publish any email address - on either my journal or my personal emails to my friends on Naseeb. Excuse me? Hello? I am not violating anyone's privacy by promoting my fledgling theatre company in my journals. I am not stupid enough to leak my personal email address to anyone on Naseeb. If I do so, I deserve to be hacked. And finally, my real annoyance at this point is with the word "hot mail" or "yah oo". I can't even use the word "yah oo" or any variation of it, in expressing my joy at being published, because a huge company by the same name hosts email addresses! Dang it, I've got to use a SPACE between the word to break it up. That is absolutely WRONG and amounts to EXTREME censorship. If people flag up profiles by all means censor them. But if I can't even use the word "yah oo" then I'm beginning to have issues with Naseeb's censorship policies." I wonder if I'll still remain in his good books as featured author. After all, do we have a right to rebel against the rules set by the Naseeb administrators? We shall wait and see. I wonder if my sarcasm is scathing enough but also shows my love for this site. Only time will tell. *foreboding sense of gloom* Oh, btw, welcome Winston! Hope you're good Cap'n.
Whoa dude, Good one. I found out how to remove testimonials from anyone's profile :P and how to view request only picutures :P. We should make a list of this stuff

New glitch I discovered on naseeb: if you even type the name hotmail or yahoo, it will not allow you to send that message....kkhee-he-he-he. To beat the system just substitute Os with Zeros and @ with ()for example: alien_contact()h0tmail.c0m ;)

I get a funny feeling, it comes from deep inside. I get all mad and angry, wanting to go and hide. My doctor calls it depression, my friends says it's just me. But the thoughts and feelings, no one will ever be able to see. Some say I'm psycho, some say I'm just weird. It's like I'm a different person, and the old me just disappeared. I get really edgy, I want to do something real bad. Then I get a headache, followed by feeling sad. I wish I could get help, I wish it would go away. Maybe if I keep praying real hard, it will some day. >:/

OK I am back..been out the whole day, LONG DAMN DAY! Let me start with a shout out and a WELCOME to every one (especially Indy) with a red carpet and for pointing out my typo ;) Like I said it's been a long damn day. Farya (fiancée'), Aliya, Bilal and Me had volunteered for the International Festival at Reliant Arena. Was busy there till 7:00 pm. Then met up with my car club one last time before I left and also had to sell some car accessories to my peeps to earn some $$$! From there we all went to see Kill Bill Vol. 2, just getting home right now 1:15AM. Opps not really, just leaving for another friends to drown my sorrows in the psycadalic smoke of a Sheesha. I SHELL RETURN!!
I found another form of heartbreak today. Having a close 'friend' betray you.
My fairwell party just got over. Did as much cleaning up as I could, it's time to just fall and sleep...am damn too tired.
